title: CNBC’s Joe Kernen warns investors to ‘prepare for the halving’ amid Bitcoin ETF hype
description: CNBC anchor Joe Kernen's tweet about the upcoming Bitcoin halving has ignited discussions in the cryptocurrency community, warranting a thorough and unbiased analysis of its potential market impact and the recent price surge linked to BlackRock Bitcoin ETF rumors.

title: Aptos (APT) Surges 27.36% in 7-Day Rally, Eyes $7.60 Price Target
description:
According to data from CoinMarketCap, Aptos (APT) has seen significant double digital gains in its cumulative seven-day performance. Specifically, CoinMarketCap data shows APT is up 27.36% since the past week. Similarly, APT’s 30-day growth is also in significant double digits. This sustained uptick put the price of the digital asset at $6.36. In parallel, Tommy […]

title: Fantom Foundation’s Sonic Testnet Goes Live: How Did FTM React?
description:
FTM hovered around $0.22 but its movement depends on buying strength and money flow. Open interest increased, which could indicate high demand in contracts linked to FTM.
